definition: place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point
to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish

sentences.english: In your experience, what benefits has recruitment brought to your club?
sentences.chinese: 在你經驗中，於貴社吸收新社員時有何益處？

sentences.english: But there's no proof that taking colloidal silver by mouth has any benefits.
sentences.chinese: 但並沒有證據證明口服膠銀有任何益處。

sentences.english: Everthing is for your own best interests.
sentences.chinese: 每一樣東西都是爲了你最大的益處。

sentences.english: Look, sexual chemistry with other people is normal, and feeling guilty about a crush is an exercise in futility.
sentences.chinese: 暗地的迷戀添入活躍感覺對現在兩人是有益處的。

sentences.english: One of educational system reforms is implementing flexible educational system, students have benefited from it.
sentences.chinese: 彈性學制給學生帶來了益處，是高等教育改革的方向。

sentences.english: They cancel out the benefits of modernization. They break the bank.
sentences.chinese: 它們將抵消現代化的益處，並將耗盡資財。

sentences.english: Such realism is useful in the development of automated CCTV systems.
sentences.chinese: 這麼寫實的程度，對研發自動閉路電視系統很有益處。

sentences.english: The value of a university education is priceless.
sentences.chinese: 大學教育的益處是千金難買的。

sentences.english: Skinny-dipping at gunpoint did not do the South Africans much good.
sentences.chinese: 南非運動員被槍指着裸體下水也沒有多大益處。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of the use of continuous subcutaneous insulin infusion(CSII) in diabetic patients in paraoperation period.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察胰島素泵在糖尿病患者圍手術期應用的益處。

sentences.english: Of course, they bring unique benefits that compensate for the restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 當然，它們帶來的獨特益處足以彌補這些限制。

sentences.english: There are many organizations which could benefit from your volunteer efforts.
sentences.chinese: 有許多組織能夠從你的義務工作中獲得益處。

sentences.english: I think we all benefit from the space shuttle in very important ways.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲我們大家在某些重要方面都從太空梭獲得益處。

sentences.english: The benefits of software reuse are well known.
sentences.chinese: 軟件再使用的益處總所周知。

sentences.english: How beneficial is surgery for cervical radiculopathy and myelopathy?
sentences.chinese: 頸椎神經根病變和脊髓病變的手術有多大益處？

sentences.english: The health benefits of chocolate come from flavonoids, a type of phytochemical found in the cacao bean.
sentences.chinese: 巧克力的益處來源於可可豆中的一種黃酮。

definition: regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
fears of trouble in the rear (idiom); family worries (obstructing freedom of action)/worries about the future consequences/often in negative expressions, meaning "no worries about anything"
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
